Body: I am thinking of developing an application that turns the LED flash for the Android camera very fast on/off, and I was wondering if anyone knows about hardware/OS limitation specifications.The flash light software I've used so far on my Samsung GT s7580 seemed to have pretty big latency when I tried to switch on and off, and the application I want to make needs to keep the light open for a 10th of a second...Am I barking up the wrong tree? I am suspecting also that the camera flash LED will get used up, as well, any info regarding that would be nice.
Title: How fast can a camera LED normally flash?

history.Text: I am thinking of developing an application that turns the LED flash for the Android camera very fast on/off, and I was wondering if anyone knows about hardware/OS limitation specifications.The flash light software I've used so far on my Samsung GT s7580 seemed to have pretty big latency when I tried to switch on and off, and the application I want to make needs to keep the light open for a 10th of a second...Am I barking up the wrong tree? I am suspecting also that the camera flash LED will get used up, as well, any info regarding that would be nice.
How fast can a camera LED normally flash?
